documentation.text:
@notice Used to fetch the price from LongShort at that point in time
 @dev tokenShiftIndex => longShortMarketPriceSnapshotIndex
@dev marketIndex => usersAddress => stakerTokenShiftIndex
@dev marketIndex => usersAddress => amountUserRequestedToShiftAwayFromLongOnNextUpdate
@dev marketIndex => usersAddress => amountUserRequestedToShiftAwayFromShortOnNextUpdate

@notice Changes admin for the contract
@param _admin The address of the new admin.
@dev Logic for changeFloatPercentage

@notice Changes percentage of float that is minted for float capital.
@param newFloatPercentage The new float percentage in base 1e18.
@dev Logic for changeUnstakeFee
@dev Logic for changeMarketLaunchIncentiveParameters
@dev Logic for changeBalanceIncentiveExponent
@dev Logic for changeBalanceIncentiveEquilibriumOffset
@dev Calculates the accumulated float in a specific range of staker snapshots

@notice Mints outstanding float for msg.sender.
@param marketIndexes Identifiers for the markets for which to mint float.

@notice Allows users to withdraw their entire stake for a token.
@param token Address of the token for which to withdraw.

@notice Used to fetch the price from LongShort at that point in time
 @dev tokenShiftIndex => longShortMarketPriceSnapshotIndex
@dev marketIndex => usersAddress => stakerTokenShiftIndex
@dev marketIndex => usersAddress => amountUserRequestedToShiftAwayFromLongOnNextUpdate
@dev marketIndex => usersAddress => amountUserRequestedToShiftAwayFromShortOnNextUpdate

@notice Changes admin for the contract
@param _admin The address of the new admin.
@dev Logic for changeFloatPercentage

@notice Changes percentage of float that is minted for float capital.
@param newFloatPercentage The new float percentage in base 1e18.
@dev Logic for changeUnstakeFee
@dev Logic for changeMarketLaunchIncentiveParameters
@dev Logic for changeBalanceIncentiveExponent
@dev Logic for changeBalanceIncentiveEquilibriumOffset
@dev Calculates the accumulated float in a specific range of staker snapshots

@notice Mints outstanding float for msg.sender.
@param marketIndexes Identifiers for the markets for which to mint float.

@notice Allows users to withdraw their entire stake for a token.
@param token Address of the token for which to withdraw.

params.kInitialMultiplier: Initial boost on float generation for the market.
params.kPeriod: Period which the boost should last.
params.longToken: Address of the long token for the market.
params.shortToken: Address of the short token for the market.
params.unstakeFee_e18: Percentage of tokens that are levied on unstaking in base 1e18.

params._admin: The address of the new admin.

params._balanceIncentiveCurve_exponent: The new exponent for the curve.

params.newFloatPercentage: The new float percentage in base 1e18.

params.initialMultiplier: The new multiplier on Float generation.
params.period: The new period for which float token generation should be boosted.

params.marketIndexes: Identifiers for the markets for which to mint float.
Identifiers for the markets for which to mint float.

params._floatCapital: Address of the contract which earns a fixed percentage of Float.
params._floatPercentage: Determines the float percentage that gets minted for Float Capital, base 1e18.
params._floatToken: Address of the Float token earned by staking.
params._longShort: Address of the LongShort contract, a deployed LongShort.sol

params.longPrice: The price of the long token as defined in LongShort.sol
params.longValue: The value locked in the long side of the market.
params.shortPrice: The price of the short token as defined in LongShort.sol
params.shortValue: The value locked in the short side of the market.
params.stakerTokenShiftIndex_to_longShortMarket: Mapping from this contract's shifts to LongShort.sols next price snapshots.

params.isShiftFromLong: Whether the shift is from long to short or short to long.

params.token: Address of the token for which to withdraw.
Address of the token for which to withdraw.

stakerTokenShiftIndex_to_accumulativeFlo.details: tokenShiftIndex => accumulativeFloatIssuanceSnapshotIndex POSSIBLE OPTIMIZATION - could pack stakerTokenShiftIndex_to_accumulativeFloatIssuanceSnapshotIndex_mapping and stakerTokenShiftIndex_to_longShortMarketPriceSnapshotIndex_mapping into a struct of two uint128 for storage space optimization.

addNewStakingFund(uint32,address,address.notice: Sets this contract to track staking for a market in LongShort.sol

changeBalanceIncentiveEquilibriumOffset(.notice: Changes the balance incentive curve equilibrium offset for a market

changeBalanceIncentiveExponent(uint32,ui.notice: Changes the balance incentive exponent for a market

changeFloatPercentage(uint256).notice: Changes percentage of float that is minted for float capital.

changeMarketLaunchIncentiveParameters(ui.notice: Changes the market launch incentive parameters for a market

changeUnstakeFee(uint32,uint256).notice: Changes unstake fee for a market

claimFloatCustomFor(uint32[],address).notice: Mints outstanding float on behalf of another user.

pushUpdatedMarketPricesToUpdateFloatIssu.notice: Adds new accumulativeIssuancePerStakedSynthSnapshots for the given long/short tokens. Called by the ILongShort contract whenever there is a state change for a market.

shiftTokens(uint256,uint32,bool).notice: Allows users to shift their staked tokens from one side of the market to  the other at the next price.

stakeFromUser(address,uint256).notice: A user with synthetic tokens stakes by calling stake on the token contract which calls this function. We need to first update the state of the LongShort contract for this market before staking to correctly calculate user rewards.

stakerTokenShiftIndex_to_accumulativeFlo.notice: Used to link a token shift to a staker state

stakerTokenShiftIndex_to_longShortMarket.notice: Used to fetch the price from LongShort at that point in time

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw function. Allows users to unstake.

withdrawAll(address).notice: Allows users to withdraw their entire stake for a token.
